original_title: Debate on domestic debt restructuring tomorrow
original_body_lines: The parliamentary debate on the domestic debt restructuring will be held from 9.30 am to 7.30 pm tomorrow, the Communications Department of Parliament said.
The decision was made at the Committee of Parliamentary Business which met today.
Accordingly, the debate will not be held on Sunday as reported earlier and will be limited to Saturday only.
The parliamentary session will not be held on Tuesday (4) and business scheduled for Tuesday will be taken up for debate on Friday (7).(AS & YP)
